name: Median annual salaries of U.S. residing full-time employed doctoral scientists and engineers, by employer location and broad occupation: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.description: All Full Time Employed Median Salary

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Median annual salaries are for principal job and are rounded to nearest $1,000. Standard errors are rounded up to the nearest $500. Full time is based on working 35 or more hours per week. Because survey sample design does not include geography, reliability of estimates in some states may be poor due to small sample size. Residence location is based on reported living location on 1 February 2021.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2021.
